field_name._datatype: timeseries | module | interface | group | str | f4 | f8 | int8 | int16 | int32 | int64 | uint8 | uint16 | uint32 | uint64 | unrestricted
field_name._alternative: alt mandatory field (ie, if this mandatory field isn't present, another will suffice)
field_name._value: field value -- if this field is present, the data for the field is written out
field_name._linkto: path to target; field name must match name in specified target
field_name.<>: standard object (eg, group or timeseries) with arbitrary name (ie, part of spec)
field_name.[]: custom object with arbitrary name (ie, optional user defined)
